cl:cql.cl:update: CREATE TABLE recording_metadata ( recordingid timeuuid, field text, value text, PRIMARY KEY ((recordingid), field) ) WITH COMPACT STORAGE AND CLUSTERING ORDER BY (field ASC);

cl:changeset.author: tweidlin
cl:changeset.cl:description: Add table for counts of recordings keyed by place and timebucket

cl:cql.cl:update: CREATE TABLE place_recording_index ( placeid uuid, field text, value text, recordingid timeuuid, size bigint, PRIMARY KEY ((placeid, field), value, recordingid) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (value DESC, recordingid DESC);

cl:changeset.author: tweidlin
cl:changeset.cl:description: Add table for tracking total bytes stored by a user

cl:cql.cl:update: CREATE TABLE place_quota ( placeid uuid, bytesused bigint, PRIMARY KEY (placeid) )
